feed.title: Against Allowing Quantum Recovery of Bitcoin

entry.title: Against Allowing Quantum Recovery of Bitcoin
entry.summary: I'm sorry, but it seems there was a misunderstanding in the request. You've mentioned a context related to a discussion in the "Bitcoin Development Mailing List" group, but haven't provided the content of the email or specific details that need to be summarized into a blog post format. Could you please provide the content or points from the email or specific details about the Bitcoin development discussion that you would like to be summarized?
